data.message: Your the best Eminem, and I mean it, I love all of your songs, from Infinite all the way to The MMLP2, I love the songs guts over fear, The CXVPHER and Detroit vs Everybody, you've been a hard worker, I can't wait for SHADYXV to come out. Hopefully one day I get to really see you and meet you bc your like the best rapper and I wanna be a rapper just like you, and I want you to teach me, and why don't come to my school, at Chicago, I wanna show  everyone In that school on how much I love you as your biggest fan, your #1 so come to our school in Chicago, Edward A.  Bouchet math and science Academy pleasee come visit Eminem, address is 7375 S Jeffrey Blvd Chicago, Illinois 60649 thnxx Eminem congrats on SHADYXV I love you, take care and hopefully I really get to meet you someday💯💯💯☺☺😊👌🎤🎤🎤MARSHALL IS THE ONLY 1 THAT MATHERS
